snippet.title: Daydream: Forgotten Sorrow - Consoles Launch Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Daydream: Forgotten Sorrow will be available on July 25 on PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S/X, and Nintendo Switch for $19.99.

In Daydream: Forgotten Sorrow, players experience the altered memories of a dying man, reliving his entire life as a little boy named Griffin while lying on his deathbed. As Griffin, accompanied by his steadfast teddy bear Birly, players explore the profound depths of his subconscious. They assist Griffin in shedding the remains of his miserable life before his impending demise, delving into the emotions and memories of an elderly man burdened with life's hardships and disappointments.

We may be busy little bees, but you should follow these pages!
► Visit our official page: https://ravenage.games
► Twitter: https://twitter.com/ravenage_games 
► YouTube: youtube.com/ravenage  
► Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ravenage.games
► Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ravenage.games
► TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@ravenage
